name: MOLEBOTS
description:
MOLEBOTS is a 3D futuristic platformer game of a virtual world, which an antivirus by the name XEROX is digitally uploaded into the virtual hardware world to obtain data resources in the form of orbs and eradicate as much virus and malware as possible and face their overload TEROX before being absorbed into at the extraction point

How to play MOLEBOTS

1. Maintain firing power or ammo

2. Obtain all 5 orbs

3. Battle your path to the overlord 

4. Defeat the overlord

5. Head to the extraction portal to win

System  requirements

1. 4gb of RAM or more

2. Upgraded i3 - i5 processors (Recommended)

3. 1gb hardrive space at least

4. 2gb or more dedicated graphics card (optional)
